id: Bart Scott goes off on Jets coach Todd Bowles after loss: 'What the hell are you talking about!?'Bart Scott goes off on Jets coach Todd Bowles after loss: 'What the hell are you talking about!?'Bart Scott goes off on Jets coach Todd Bowles after loss: 'What the hell are you talking about!?'
paragraph:

				Please re-enter your email address.			
			You'll now receive the top For The Win stories each day directly in your inbox.		

	By Andy Nesbitt
November 4, 2018 5:58 pm

		By: Andy Nesbitt		| November 4, 2018 5:58 pm		

Former Jets linebacker Bart Scott was not happy with what Jets coach Todd Bowles had to say about the team’s defense not getting any turnovers in Sunday’s 13-6 loss to the Dolphins on Sunday.And because Scott is a part of a Jets postgame show on SportsNet New York, he was able to voice is anger on live TV.Jets fans, you’re gonna want to watch this:.@BartScott57 going OFF on Todd Bowles pic.twitter.com/0EcMm48gb8— SportsNet New York (@SNYtv) November 4, 2018He said:What are you talking about! Four sacks, holding Osweiler to 15-of-24 for 139 yards. What the hell are you talking about!? That’s the type of statement that pisses me off in the locker room as a defensive player and we gotta have a conversation. Because you start pointing fingers at us that we aren’t doing good enough – you didn’t do good enough. You didn’t prepare us good enough. You didn’t represent us good enough. You didn’t make adjustments. We had questions and you didn’t give us any answers. How about that one! Jets fans loved what Scott had to say:make Bart Scott interim coach  cant be worse https://t.co/gFeguY8gFg— scherrenough (@djays1) November 4, 2018"Let's Take His Drawing Board!!!" Bart Scott has the right dam idea! Bowles gotta go! https://t.co/LnN3eUtUbI— SLEEZYULTRAMEGA (@DJSokeSleezy) November 4, 2018I saw that disaster in person, and I was going to come on here and vent, but I think Bart Scott did a good enough job for me #NYJets #JetsNation #JetUp #Jets @ Hard Rock… https://t.co/8CpIG3jdCQ— The_Sixth_Borough (@Airbrklyn) November 4, 2018I would love to hear Bart Scott go off like this on Fred, Jeff, and Saul one day!— FredJeffSaul3Stooges (@NYM3stooges) November 4, 2018There's Bart Scott, basically saying Todd Bowles can't stop a nose bleed. https://t.co/t3Khb6PxWS— Matt Naham (@matt_naham) November 4, 2018Love Bart Scott so much passion— Baseball Bob (@baseballbob247) November 4, 2018Bart Scott is EVERY Jets fan (h/t: @SNYtv) pic.twitter.com/GBuJtOzu7S— Andrew Claudio (@Claudio_GSN) November 4, 2018Bart Scott, New York Jets, NFL, Todd Bowles, NFL
